citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS official during the inspection process at 1:30PM on
7/17/2014. A responsible adult must be present for all inspection processes. Contact the inspector by 7/24/2014 to
provide times of availability.
